data.title: THE CABINET
data.meta_description: KALKIDAN SAMUEL Class of 2024 What do you think are your most important duties as President? As CSF Co- president I believe that I should go above my assigned responsibilities and make sure each and...
data.text:
KALKIDAN SAMUEL

Class of 2024

What do you think are your most important duties as President?

As CSF Co- president I believe that I should go above my assigned responsibilities and make sure each and every student feels welcome and is able to be their best self not only at CSF, but anywhere on campus.

​What does service mean to you?

To me service means putting effort into helping others through the goodness of your heart seeking only a new found/maintained connection Awith your community.

What cause are you most passionate about?

I'm most passionate about adopt don’t shop!

What is something people don't know about you that you wish they knew?

I have two dogs, a cocker-spaniel/chihuahua mix and a maltipoo/chihuahua mix.​

ASHLEY DIMAS

Class of 2024

What do you think are your most important duties as Co-President?

As Co-President, it is my responsibility to work alongside the rest of the cabinet to create a dynamic environment. Pitching in ideas to improve our club’s ability to promote community service and recognize academic excellence is essential to my duty. I fully plan to perform my responsibilities in the most efficient manner possible.

​What does service mean to you?

Service to me means giving back to the community without the idea of compensation. It also means helping out fellow peers just for the good of it so we can create connections amongst one another.

What cause are you most passionate about?

I am most passionate about healthcare reform. I believe that medical assistance is an indispensable service that someone will need at least once in their life. Therefore, making it affordable whilst continuing the improvement of its quality of service is extremely important. People must have the ability to go to the hospital without being overcharged for necessary service

What is something people don't know about you that you wish they knew?

I am very adventurous and a thrill-seeker! Bungee Jumping and Skydiving are both extremely exciting activities that I’d love to experience.

DANIEL RODRIGUEZ

Class of 2024

​What do you think are your most important duties as Secretary?

Being the Secretary of Knight CSF is a huge responsibility. I want to make sure all of our club information stays organized and set goals on dates and keep track of everything the is mentioned in the cabinet meetings to help bring those ideas to reality.

​What does service mean to you?

Volunteering means doing things for others and the world without asking for anything in return. Doing it out of the kindness out of your heart and knowing your actions are beneficial to those around you and for the world.

What cause are you most passionate about?

I am most passionate about helping others. I have lots of leadership roles in the community and my biggest goal is to make sure someone learns something new or after I help someone or walk them through it, they get something meaningful out of it and they continue to grow.

What is something people don't know about you that you wish they knew?

I am very passionate for what I am committed to. I will do anything for anyone no matter what the cost is because I know I am helping someone in a big way while I’m giving up something small.

OMAR SANTIAGO

Class of 2024

​

What do you think are your most important duties as Treasurer?

As Treasurer, I believe my most important duties are to manage the CSF budget, give my input on the best way to manage and allocate our funds and help create a confident, safe and confident place for students

​What does service mean to you?

To me, service means doing good for the community, helping others, and feeling better in return.

What cause are you most passionate about?

The cause I'm most passionate about is protecting and helping the environment, this includes wildlife. I've always loved green life and the bugs and critters that reside within them, innovations and inventions that support and help the environment catch my eye.

What is something people don't know about you that you wish they knew?

I am lactose intolerant and I wouldn't mind buying a guinea pig at my local pet store for $30 and turning it into a nice hot stew.

GAEL BARBOSA

Class of 2024

​

What do you think are your most important duties as senator?

I feel that the most important duty as CSF Senator is to quickly and efficiently relay information from ASB to the CSF cabinet and vise versa.

What Does Service Mean To You?

Doing something out of kindness without expecting anything in return.

What Cause are you passionate about?

I'm very passionate about science and engineering and the advancement of technology as a whole, technology is just so versatile and could fix a ton of problems.

What is something people don’t know about you that you wish they’d know?

I am perpetually tired.

NATALIA SILVA

Class of 2024

What do you think are your most important duties as Fundraising Director?

As CSF’s Fundraising Director, I believe it is my responsibility to ensure our club has the funds to support our ideas. It is essential that our club can participate in activities that expand our club outreach and impact our community with the use of our own funds!

​What does service mean to you?

To me, service means putting other people’s needs first. A community is a reflection of the people in it! Service is helping out with problems that may not concern you, but you do it because it is essential to support those around you!

What cause are you most passionate about?

I am most passionate about protecting the environment. It is essential to recognize the irreversible damage that humans have done to the Earth. Our planet deserves respect and only we humans can work towards helping it strive and flourish.

What is something people don't know about you that you wish they knew?

That I have done Karate for 7 years. ​

NATALIE MARQUEZ

Class of 2025

What do you think are your most important duties as Tutoring Coordinator?

I believe that as a tutoring coordinator, being able to help students achieve a positive change in their education and academic skills is my most important duty.

​What does service mean to you?

Volunteering and community service are great ways to connect and support those who are in need of receiving help. I believe it makes me closer and more connected with my community.

What cause are you most passionate about?

As a young woman I think that Women's Rights is something I should be very passionate and educated about since it affects me directly.

What is something people don't know about you that you wish they knew?

Something I wish people knew about me is that I'm constantly thinking. I don't like hints, I prefer when people and things are straightforward and brutally honest. If what surrounds me lacks the sense of being straightforward it sends my mind on a loop, but it helps me look though every aspect of a problem I'm facing. This eventually helps me find a better solution and sometimes helps me work around a problem instead of going straight through it.​

OMAR SANTIAGO

Class of 2024

What do you think are your most important duties as Historian?

As a historian, my most important duties is cooperating with the publicist and other cabinet members, be active in meetings and events, take photos and record events and fundraisers and maintain a Google drive, and perform duties which are directed to me by the president or club advisor.

​What does service mean to you?

Doing good for the community, helping others and feeling better in return.

What cause are you most passionate about?

The cause I'm most passionate about is protecting and helping the environment, this includes wildlife. I've always loved green life and the bugs and critters that reside within them, innovations and inventions that support and help the environment always catch my eye.

What is something people don't know about you that you wish they knew?

I know a lot about Star Wars, about different bug species and their living patterns.​

BETHZY OSUNA

Class of 2025

What do you think are your most important duties as Tutoring Coordinator?

The most important duties as a tutoring coordinator is to help in anyway I can when a classmate in need of help in a certain class, by giving them resources, and/or a tutor to help them out.

​What does service mean to you?

Volunteering and community service to me means to help out an support others to the best of our ability to help make our community be better place.

What cause are you most passionate about?

The cause im most passionate about is curing Alzheimr's. I believe that the pain of a loved one not being able to remember the memories you shared with them, or your name and the love they have for you is just unbearable. As well as the person suffering from this illness won't be able to have their old opinions, thoughts, habits, and enjoy the beauty of life as they once knew it. I love the idea have having more research to disease to at least slow the effects if not neven cure it overall

What is something people don't know about you that you wish they knew?

I wish people knew that I genuinely enjoy responsibility although I may stress about it. I enjoy having deadlines and to be constantly working because it makes me feel productive. When people say to just drop it or do something else it just makes me want to do it more because I feel the need to now show I can do it.​
